attributes.action: Do not call an early general election
attributes.additional_details: It is what they were elected to do and it is not an appropriate time to call an election in this country.
attributes.background: I would like the government to stick to the expected election date despite recent events.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do Not Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703000
